# Updating R

```{r}
# installing/loading the package:
if(!require(installr)) {
  install.packages("installr"); require(installr)} #load / install+load installr

# using the package:
updateR(install_R = TRUE) # this will start the updating process of your R installation.  It will check for newer versions, and if one is available, will guide you through the decisions you'd need to make.

#luego en tools elijo la nueva versión de R para que la utilice por defecto
#en mi caso algo así:  C:\Users\gmathieu\Documents\R\R-3.2.2
```
